chord.program
Class CHA

java.lang.Object
  chord.program.CHA
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScopeBuilder
public class CHA
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScopeBuilder

Class Hierarchy Analysis (CHA) based scope builder. This scope builder currently does not resolve any reflection; use RTA instead.

Author:
Mayur Naik (mhn@cs.stanford.edu)
